Text.Page:
The Sihran defenders have surroundeed the Winterwolves Encampment on Mount Tyrannas. We can't seem to thin those buggers out!

Take out as many {@LinkCreature:32#4#Sihran ragers} and {@LinkCreature:32#6#defenders}, and {@LinkCreature:32#5#tuwangi thumpers} as you can.

Kamese will have your reward, as usual.
Well done, <PCNAME>. Better delayed than wasted.
You need to eliminate the {@LinkCreature:32#4#Sihran ragers} and {@LinkCreature:32#6#defenders}, and {@LinkCreature:32#5#tuwangi thumpers}.
